### emitGPRel32Value {#a61a28ad265baba2e22ed48dbdf55cdb8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;MCNullStreamer.cpp&#125;::MCNullStreamer::emitGPRel32Value (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &#42; Value)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Emit the expression <code>Value</code> into the output as a gprel32 (32-bit GP relative) value.

This is used to implement assembler directives such as .gprel32 on targets that support them.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/mcnullstreamer-cpp/#l00044">44</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/mcnullstreamer-cpp">MCNullStreamer.cpp</a>.

### emitRawTextImpl {#ae4b88fe1344f93b81e844c35208789ab}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;MCNullStreamer.cpp&#125;::MCNullStreamer::emitRawTextImpl (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> String)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
EmitRawText - If this file is backed by an assembly streamer, this dumps the specified string in the output .s file.

This capability is indicated by the <a href="#a8885d11e823a815894aba602ef8cf6e5">hasRawTextSupport()</a> predicate.
